# DropErc1155ClaimConditions class

Manages claim conditions for Edition Drop contracts

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DropErc1155ClaimConditions<TContract extends PrebuiltEditionDrop | BaseClaimConditionERC1155>
```

| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, metadata, storage)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DropErc1155ClaimConditions</code> class |

| Method                                                                                                                               | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| [getActive(tokenId, options)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.getactive.md)                                                         |           | Get the currently active claim condition                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [getAll(tokenId, options)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.getall.md)                                                               |           | Get all the claim conditions                                                                                                                                                                                          |

| [getClaimerProofs(tokenId, claimerAddress, claimConditionId)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.getclaimerproofs.md)                  |           | Returns allow list information and merkle proofs for the given address.                                                                                                                                               |
| [getClaimIneligibilityReasons(tokenId, quantity, addressToCheck)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.getclaimineligibilityreasons.md)  |           | For any claim conditions that a particular wallet is violating, this function returns human-readable information about the breaks in the condition that can be used to inform the user.                               |
| [getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress, tokenId, quantity, options)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.getclaimtransaction.md)       |           | Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
| [isLegacyMultiPhaseDrop(contractWrapper)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.islegacymultiphasedrop.md)                                |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

| [isNewMultiphaseDrop(contractWrapper)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.isnewmultiphasedrop.md)                                      |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [isNewSinglePhaseDrop(contractWrapper)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.isnewsinglephasedrop.md)                                    |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [prepareClaim(tokenId, quantity, checkERC20Allowance, address)](./sdk.droperc1155claimconditions.prepareclaim.md)                    |           | Returns proofs and the overrides required for the transaction.                                                                                                                                                        |
